ISSUE.TITLE: Feature: unique URL for each row (when previewed in a pop-up)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When using the expand button to preview a row in a pop-up, it would be useful if the URL changed to match this unique row. This enables saving specific rows to bookmarks, sharing links, it allows browser history to track which you've viewed, going forward and back in tab history, etc.
